Gain industry recognition and excellent career development opportunities with BCS Professional Membership. 

 With the letters MBCS after your name, you will have unrivalled access to networking opportunities, specialist events and publications. 

 Professional Membership is also your pathway to Chartered status through the institute. 

 To become a Professional Member (MBCS) you will need: 

 ♦ 5 years IT work experience, or 

 ♦ 2 - 3 years IT work experience plus relevant recognised qualifications (depending on level of qualification), or 

 ♦ an Honours degree with BCS accreditation.
